comments.body: FYI, it would be nice if you could create a separate PR that moves all the dataset op names into a utility namespace `tensorflor::data::name_utils` and replace all uses of string literals for dataset names (e.g. in `DatasetBase::DebugString()` and `IteratorBase::prefix()`) with named constants. If you would like to do that, please send me an initial PR that only does it for a couple of dataset ops so that we can agree on the general approach -- that way you will not have to make O(n) changes based on my feedback.
Thanks for your suggestion! Yeah, will work on it.
